    A helper class for Location

      Calculate the distance to the farthest monitored geofence
      static boolean needGeozoneUpdate()
      Check if it's necessary to download geo zones
      static long significantLocationUpdateInterval()
      Return update interval for significant location update We suppose that it will update 20 times(BACKGROUND_LOCATION_UPDATE_INTERVAL_FACTOR) if user walks straightly from the center of monitored geofences to the farthest of monitored geofence. DISTANCE - center to the farthest monitored geofence TIMES - location update times: 20 SPEED - suppose user walking speed is 0.8 meter per second The result: (DISTANCE/SPEED)/TIMES
      static java.util.List<com.phunware.engagement.entities.Geozone> sortGeozones()

        public static float monitoringRadius()

        Calculate the distance to the farthest monitored geofence

      • significantLocationUpdateInterval

        public static long significantLocationUpdateInterval()

        Return update interval for significant location update

        We suppose that it will update 20 times(BACKGROUND_LOCATION_UPDATE_INTERVAL_FACTOR) if user walks straightly from the center of monitored geofences to the farthest of monitored geofence.

        • DISTANCE - center to the farthest monitored geofence
        • TIMES - location update times: 20
        • SPEED - suppose user walking speed is 0.8 meter per second

        The result:

        (DISTANCE/SPEED)/TIMES

        Returns:
